page.title: 18Food
page.content: I do not often get a chance to choose wht I want to eat. I do like what my mum and sister cook. I do not like big store food because it is'nt fresh. In my country Bangladesh my family has its own cows,goats and chickens.We grow our own vegetables and fruit.Since I came to this country I always went to shops to buy sweets which have made my teeth bad. When I was in Bangladesh I did not eat sweets and we did not have frozen food like we do in this country. I eat rice and curry everyday and never get bored of it.I don't do the shopping my mum,dad or big brother does it. Sometimes I eat so much I don't feel like eating anymore. I don't like meat a lot.I like cherries,strawberries and mangoes.
